name: /servers
description: Returns a list of currently online player servers.

name: /server/Server ID
description: Returns basic information of a server using its ID.

name: /server/Server Name?byName=true
description: Same as the previous, but uses the name instead of the ID.

name: /plugins_public
description: Returns all the available plugins for Minehut servers, along with their id, name, and description.

name: /users/login
description: Returns token, user id, and servers from login credentials.

name: /users/ghost_login
description: Returns the same data as /users/login, but instead of using a request body, it uses authorization.

name: /users/signup
description: Signup using an email and date of birth. Also sends a verification code to said email.

name: /users/confirm_email
description: Verifies email code.

name: /user/User ID
description: Returns user info.

name: /servers/create
description: Creates a new server on the specified account (maximum of 2).

name: /servers/Server ID/server_data
description: Returns similar information to /server/{server-id}.

name: /server/Server ID/status
description: Returns the status of the server (starting, stopping, players online, plugins etc.).

name: /server/Server ID/start_service
description: Brings the server out of hibernation and starts it.

name: /server/Server ID/start
description: Starts the server if it's not in hibernation.

name: /server/Server ID/shutdown
description: Stops the server, but does not put it in hibernation.

name: /server/Server ID/destroy_service
description: Immediately stops the server and puts it in hibernation.

name: /server/Server ID/repair_files
description: Attempts to repair the server files incase of an issue.

name: /server/Server ID/reset_all
description: Completely resets the server (Erases all files on it).

name: /server/Server ID/send_command
description: Runs a console command to the server.

name: /server/Server ID/change_name
description: Changes the servers name. Error 400 if name is already taken.

name: /server/Server ID/change_motd
description: Changes the servers MOTD (message of the day).

name: /server/Server ID/visibility
description: Changes whether your server appears in the server list.

name: /server/Server ID/save
description: Saves the servers world.

name: /server/Server ID/reset_world
description: Resets the servers world with a new seed.

name: /server/Server ID/edit_server_properties
body: {"field":"See below for possible values", "value":"A value pertaining to the field"}
description: Changes values in the server.properties file.

Possible fields are max_players, level_type, level_name, generator_settings, gamemode, force_gamemode, pvp, spawn_mobs, spawn_animals, allow_flight, generator_settings, difficulty, hardcore, enable_command_block, announce_player_achievements, allow_nether, generate_structures, and resource_pack.

name: file/world/upload/Server ID
description: Uploads a .zip world.
